welcome_message_body: Welcome to Taylorsville, where small town charm meets big city amenities! Known for its friendly community and beautiful parks, we invite you to explore our city and enjoy all it has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Salt Lake City International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Salt Lake City International Airport, primarily serving regional and low-cost carriers.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Salt Lake City International Airport, dedicated to Delta Air Lines and its partners.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but it may be limited in some areas.
